channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Here's another chance to get the Shokz OpenRun Pro for a record-low price
item.description: The Shokz OpenRun Pro are a great alternative to earbuds for exercise and running – and they're now back to a record-low price on Amazon for Black Friday.

item.title: Somehow, ‘Sharknado’ Will Return With an Origin Movie
item.description: If you've found yourself wondering if 'Sharknado' would come back, it is! And if you didn't, well, it still is, so...surprise?

item.title: Jury says Apple owes Masimo $634M for patent infringement
item.description: A federal jury in California ruled Friday that Apple must pay medical device maker Masimo $634 million for infringing a patent on blood oxygen monitoring technology.

item.title: Asus ROG NUC has a major mini PC rival - this new challenger offers fantastic specs for work and gaming, and comes from a company with possibly the greatest name ever
item.description: Thunderobot Mix G2 compact gaming mini PC offers RTX 50 GPUs, Intel Ultra HX processors, and workstation-level performance.

item.title: I’ve been testing digital photo frames for years, and I've just found my favorite design – Pexar’s innovative rear-lit stunner
item.description: The Pexar digital photo frame has become one of my personal faves, thanks to its gorgeous build and innovative lighting.

item.title: The 57 best early Black Friday deals: Get big savings on MacBooks, Nintendo Switch 2, Keurig, and Samsung gear
item.description: We found the latest early Black Friday deals on Apple products, robot vacuums, headphones, power stations, Legos, and tons more goodies.

item.title: ‘Imagine a Cube Floating in the Air’: The New AI Dream Allegedly Driving Yann LeCun Away from Meta
item.description: The legendary AI scientist is reportedly leaving Meta. Here's what we know about why.

item.title: How to watch Ireland vs. Australia in 2025 Autumn Internationals online for free
item.description: How to watch 2025 Autumn Internationals for free. Live stream Ireland vs. Australia in the Autumn Internationals for free.

item.title: 45 early Black Friday Walmart deals: Lego sets, AirPods, and Dyson vacuums are all cheaper at Walmart right now
item.description: Walmart's early Black Friday is live from Nov. 14-16. We're tracking the best prices on smart TVs, Dyson vacuums, Lego sets, and Apple AirPods.

item.title: Tim Cook could step down as Apple CEO next year
item.description: According to the Financial Times, Tim Cook could step down as Apple CEO as early as next year. And the board has started to seriously work out a succession plan. FT says that John Ternus, Apple’s senior vice-president of hardware engineering, is considered the frontrunner for the position. Cook, who turned 65 recently, has been […]
